mapper.select: select c.no, c.name, ifnull(p.post_count, 0) as postCount, if(c.`desc`='' || c.`desc`=null, '-', c.`desc`) as `desc`, c.blog_id as blogId from category c left join (select category_no, count(*) as post_count from post group by category_no) p on c.no = p.category_no where c.blog_id=#{id } order by c.no
mapper.delete: delete from category where blog_id=#{blogId } and no=#{no }
